component.name: VoidArg
component.comment:
A demonstration component that contains six instances of ports. Two input ports have no args and an outport responds to the no args case. Two input ports have arguments and one an output port has arguments.
This component is based on two different port types.

port.name: ExtIn
port.comment: The input port has no args and is external interface

port.name: In
port.comment: The input port of type Void has no args

port.name: Out
port.comment: The output port of type Void has no args

port.name: ExtMsgIn
port.comment: The input port of type Msg has three args and is external interface

port.name: MsgIn
port.comment: The input port of type Msg has three args

port.name: MsgOut
port.comment: The input port of type Msg has three args
